title: Towel, 1920–30
medium:
Medium: cotton, silk, metal-wrapped cotton
Technique: plain weave with discontinuous supplementary wefts; warp overspun Z; both ends finished with groups of warps twisted and knotted
description: Woven towel with bands of geometric patterning at both ends. One band is eight and half inches, and the other is five inches.

tombstone.epitaph:
Towel, 1920–30. Medium: cotton, silk, metal-wrapped cotton
Technique: plain weave with discontinuous supplementary wefts; warp overspun Z; both ends finished with groups of warps twisted and knotted. 1974-92-10.
